property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Soldiers dressed with attention to detail

note.text: Dress well to gain the respect and cooperation of your counterparts. It's better to be overdressed than underdressed. Some guidelines are:

- Wear your uniform in military-to-military meetings. 
- For government meetings, wear a suit.
- In non-business situations, remain business casual with a polo shirt and slacks for men, a conservative blouse and long skirt for women, and appropriate closed-toed shoes.
